009
010package imagingbook.pub.regions;
011
012import java.util.Deque;
013import java.util.LinkedList;
014
015import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
016import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.NeighborhoodType2D;
017import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d.PntInt;
018import imagingbook.pub.regions.segment.BinaryRegionSegmentation;
019import imagingbook.pub.regions.segment.DepthFirstSegmentation;
020
021/**
022 * Binary region labeler based on a depth-first flood filling
023 * algorithm (using a queue).
024 * 
025 * @author WB
026 * @version 2020/04/01
027 * @deprecated Replaced by {@link DepthFirstSegmentation}.
028 */
029public class SegmentationDepthFirst extends BinaryRegionSegmentation {
030        
031        /**
032         * Constructor. Creates a new depth-first binary region segmenter.
033         * 
034         * @param ip A binary input image with 0 values for background pixels and values &gt; 0
035         * for foreground pixels.
036         */
037        public SegmentationDepthFirst(ByteProcessor ip) {
038                this(ip, DEFAULT_NEIGHBORHOOD);
039        }
040        
041        public SegmentationDepthFirst(ByteProcessor ip, NeighborhoodType2D nh) {
042                super(ip, nh);
043        }
044        
045        @Override
046        protected boolean applySegmentation() {
047                for (int v = 0; v < height; v++) {
048                        for (int u = 0; u < width; u++) {
049                                if (getLabel(u, v) == FOREGROUND) {
050                                        // start a new region
051                                        int label = getNextLabel();
052                                        //IJ.log(String.format("assigning label %d at (%d,%d), maxLabel=%d", label, u, v, maxLabel));
053                                        floodFill(u, v, label);
054                                }
055                        }
056                }
057                return true;
058        }
059
060        private void floodFill(int u, int v, int label) {
061                Deque<PntInt> S = new LinkedList<>();   //stack contains pixel coordinates
062                S.push(PntInt.from(u, v));
063                while (!S.isEmpty()){
064                        PntInt p = S.pop();
065                        int x = p.x;
066                        int y = p.y;
067                        if ((x >= 0) && (x < width) && (y >= 0) && (y < height) && getLabel(x, y) == FOREGROUND) {
068                                setLabel(x, y, label);
069                                S.push(PntInt.from(x + 1, y));
070                                S.push(PntInt.from(x, y + 1));
071                                S.push(PntInt.from(x, y - 1));
072                                S.push(PntInt.from(x - 1, y));
073                                if (NT == NeighborhoodType2D.N8) {
074                                        S.push(PntInt.from(x + 1, y + 1));
075                                        S.push(PntInt.from(x - 1, y + 1));
076                                        S.push(PntInt.from(x + 1, y - 1));
077                                        S.push(PntInt.from(x - 1, y - 1));
078                                }
079                        }
080                }
081        }
082
083}
